ruling_headline: Is Donald Trump still 'for single-payer' health care?
ruling_link_text: Trump has murky views on health care
statement_context: an interview on "Fox News Sunday"
statement: Says Donald Trump is for a single-payer health care system.

ruling_headline: A federal court said Rick Perry okayed a law intended to discriminate, says Hillary Clinton
ruling_link_text: Judge: law "constitutes a poll tax"
statement_context: a speech
statement: "Former Gov. Rick Perry signed a law that a federal court said was actually written with the purpose of discriminating against minority voters."

ruling_headline: Obama calls terrorist attacks random, Rick Perry says he denies anti-Semitic motivation
ruling_link_text: Obama's prior comments tell another story
statement_context: a statement
statement: "Obama has chosen to deny the vicious anti-Semitic motivation of the attack on a kosher Jewish grocery in Paris."

ruling_headline: Rick Perry: 'Historic record highs' of people from terrorists states being apprehended at border
ruling_link_text: Nowhere near a record
statement_context: comments on CNN's "State of the Union"
statement: The United States is at "historic record highs" of individuals being apprehended on the border from countries with terrorist ties such as "Pakistan or Afghanistan or Syria."

ruling_headline: Rick Perry says every engine maker is in Texas
ruling_link_text: Texas-sized claim has little proof
statement_context: a discussion on CNN's "Crossfire"
statement: "Every engine manufacturer in the United States is now in the state of Texas."

ruling_headline: Barack Obama campaign says Romney, Perry, Gingrich would cut aid to Israel to zero
ruling_link_text: None of them said they wanted zero aid for Israel
statement_context: a page on the Obama campaign website
statement: "Mitt Romney, Rick Perry, and Newt Gingrich all say they would cut foreign aid to Israel — and every other country — to zero."

ruling_headline: Rick Perry says Barack Obama is a socialist
ruling_link_text: Ridiculous distortion
statement_context: a Republican debate in New Hampshire.
statement: Says President Barack Obama "is a socialist."

ruling_headline: Rick Perry says Rick Santorum voted for a teapot museum
ruling_link_text: Yes, but not specifically
statement_context: a Web ad
statement: "Santorum also voted for a teapot museum in North Carolina."

ruling_headline: Rick Perry says Mitt Romney's book deleted line that Mass. health care law "should be the model for the country"
ruling_link_text: Book consistent that states should choose
statement_context: a Republican presidential debate in Iowa
statement: Says the paperback edition of Mitt Romney's book deleted line that Massachusetts' individual mandate "should be the model for the country"

ruling_headline: Rick Perry says federal bureaucrats will take over local building codes
ruling_link_text: No federal takeover
statement_context: remarks at the Cornerstone Action Dinner in Manchester, N.H.
statement: Under energy efficiency legislation sponsored by U.S. Sen. Jeanne Shaheen, "federal bureaucrats could take over the local building code enforcement in your city if so-called ‘green mandates’ are not complied with quickly enough."

ruling_headline: Rick Perry says taxpayers spend half a trillion dollars a year on tax preparation
ruling_link_text: A high estimate of what costs will be in the future
statement_context: a speech in Manchester, N.H.
statement: "We spend half a trillion dollars a year in tax preparation."

ruling_headline: Rick Perry says they cut property taxes by one-third in Texas
ruling_link_text: Not when you look at all property taxes
statement_context: a forum in Hampton, N.H.
statement: "We cut property taxes by one-third in the state of Texas while I’ve been governor."

ruling_headline: Mitt Romney says illegal immigrant population rose 60 percent, while California, Florida were steady
ruling_link_text: Numbers right, though Perry's not entirely to blame
statement_context: a Republican presidential debate in Las Vegas
statement: Between 2000 and 2010, the illegal immigrant population of Texas increased by 60 percent, while California and Florida had "no increase."

ruling_headline: Rick Perry ad says 'Romneycare' cost 18,000 jobs
ruling_link_text: Nobody got fired
statement_context: a campaign ad
statement: "Romneycare has … killed 18,000 Massachusetts jobs."

ruling_headline: Mitt Romney says uninsured increased under Rick Perry
ruling_link_text: Data is mixed
statement_context: a Republicam debate in Hanover, N.H.
statement: When George W. Bush was governor of Texas, "the percentage uninsured went down." Under his successor, Rick Perry, "it's gone up."

ruling_headline: Perry switched to GOP at younger age than Reagan
ruling_link_text: Perry was younger 'R' than Reagan
statement_context: Republican presidential primary debate
statement: Says he "came to the Republican Party sooner in age" than Ronald Reagan.

ruling_headline: Barack Obama slams Rick Perry on climate change, citing Texas wildfires
ruling_link_text: Growing scientific sentiment that there's a link
statement_context: a fundraising event in San Jose, Calif.
statement: Says Texas wildfires are linked to climate change.

ruling_headline: Rick Perry says Mitt Romney shifted stance when he deleted health care line from his book
ruling_link_text: Book changed, message not so much
statement_context: a Republican presidential debate in Orlando
statement: Says that Romney touted the Massachusetts health plan for the nation in his hardcover book but then deleted it for the paperback edition.

ruling_headline: Rick Perry says he never backed moving Social Security back to the states
ruling_link_text: He went right up to the line twice on national TV
statement_context: a Republican presidential debate in Orlando
statement: Says he never said he wanted to move Social Security "back to the states."

ruling_headline: Gov. Rick Perry says the federal government "has not engaged" in border security
ruling_link_text: More U.S. agents than ever patrol the border
statement_context: in the Fox News Google debate in Orlando
statement: "The federal government has not engaged in (border security) at all."

ruling_headline: Rick Perry says the 2009 stimulus 'created zero jobs'
ruling_link_text: A ridiculous claim no matter who says it
statement_context: the CNN/Tea Party Express debate
statement: "The first round of stimulus ... it created zero jobs."

ruling_headline: Mitt Romney says Rick Perry believes Social Security is unconstitutional
ruling_link_text: His 2010 book isn't explicit, but strongly suggests it
statement_context: a Republican presidential debate
statement: Says that in his book, Rick Perry said that "Social Security is unconstitutional."

ruling_headline: Rick Perry says Social Security is a Ponzi scheme
ruling_link_text: Perry's tone has softened, but his comparison is still wrong
statement_context: a Republican presidential debate
statement: Social Security is a "Ponzi scheme."

ruling_headline: Mitt Romney says Rick Perry wrote that Social Security is a 'failure'
ruling_link_text: Tough talk straight from Perry's book
statement_context: the CNN-Tea Party Express debate in Tampa
statement: "In writing his book, Gov. Perry pointed out that … by any measure Social Security has been a failure."

ruling_headline: Dukakis created jobs three times faster than Mitt Romney, says Rick Perry
ruling_link_text: Little evidence that guvs' policies were the cause
statement_context: a debate at the Reagan Library
statement: "Michael Dukakis created jobs three times faster" than Mitt Romney.

ruling_headline: Democrats say Texas graduation rate fell to 50th under Rick Perry
ruling_link_text: Stats are right, but larger forces at work than just Perry
statement_context: an interview with the 'Telegraph.'
statement: Since Rick Perry became governor, "Texas has gone from 46th in the country to 50th in the population that graduates from high school."

ruling_headline: Rick Perry says Obama boasted that crimes in border towns are now lowest in history
ruling_link_text: That was the tone, but never said safer than ever
statement_context: a house party in New Hampshire
statement: Says that when President Obama visited El Paso, he "pronounced that the border with Mexico and the United States was safer than it ever was in history."

ruling_headline: Rick Perry says Obama delivered $2 billion to Brazil to help offshore drilling
ruling_link_text: Not $2 billion and not from Obama
statement_context: a speech at a house party in New Hampshire.
statement: Says President Barack Obama delivered $2 billion to Brazil to help with offshore drilling projects.

ruling_headline: Rick Perry says Texas added 21,000 doctors because of tort reform
ruling_link_text: Doctors go where the people are
statement_context: a speech at "Politics and Eggs" in Bedford, N.H.
statement: Says Texas gained 21,000 doctors due to tort reform.

ruling_headline: Rick Perry says more and more scientists are questioning global warming
ruling_link_text: Actually, consensus is solid
statement_context: a campaign stop in New Hampshire
statement: Scientists are "questioning the original idea that man-made global warming is what is causing the climate to change. … (It is) more and more being put into question."

ruling_headline: Did Gov. Rick Perry change position on same sex marriage?
ruling_link_text: A change in emphasis
statement_context: a column in "POLITICO"
statement: Says Rick Perry flip-flopped on gay marriage by first saying it was a state’s rights issue and then saying he was in favor of a federal constitutional amendment banning gay marriage.
